## IRoomInfo.freeTeamMaxPlayers property

\[自由数量的队伍\] 指定每支队伍的最大玩家数, 同时还需要指定 freeTeamMinPlayers

**Signature:**

```typescript
freeTeamMaxPlayers?: number;
```
